thread_subject: Ship Date Needed for Penthouse A Custom Casework
reason: Multiple follow-ups with no reply from vendor; possible delay.
recommended_action: Escalate to Project Manager for decision on alternate vendor or penalty notice.

conversation_history.subject: Ship Date Needed for Penthouse A Custom Casework
conversation_history.body: Hi David, could you please confirm the ship date for the custom casework? We need this information to update our project schedule.

conversation_history.subject: Follow-Up: Ship Date Needed for Penthouse A Custom Casework
conversation_history.body: Following up on my earlier message. Could you please provide the confirmed ship date for the casework?

conversation_history.subject: Second Reminder: Ship Date Confirmation Pending
conversation_history.body: This is our second follow-up regarding the casework shipment. Please respond as soon as possible to avoid project delay.

conversation_history.subject: Escalation – Vendor Non-Response on Penthouse A Casework
conversation_history.body: Hi Chandru, despite three follow-ups, we have not received any response from Elite Millwork regarding the ship date for Penthouse A custom casework. This delay may affect the procurement schedule. Please review and advise on escalation or alternative vendor action.

reason: Awaiting delivery timeline confirmation for critical HVAC materials.
recommended_action: Escalate to Project Manager to determine alternate supply source or delay notification.

conversation_history.subject: HVAC Duct Delivery Timeline Confirmation
conversation_history.body: Hi Team, could you please confirm the expected delivery date for the HVAC ducts? This is critical for our installation plan.

conversation_history.subject: Follow-Up: HVAC Duct Delivery Timeline Confirmation
conversation_history.body: Following up on my previous email. We have not yet received a confirmation for the delivery schedule.

conversation_history.subject: Escalation – No Response from HVAC Supplier for Project Phoenix
conversation_history.body: Hi Chandru, the HVAC supplier has not confirmed the duct delivery timeline after multiple follow-ups. Please review the situation and guide if we should initiate escalation to vendor management or source from a backup supplier.

reason: Critical design approval required before installation can proceed.
recommended_action: Escalate to Project Manager to expedite design team coordination.

conversation_history.subject: Electrical Panel Approval Status
conversation_history.body: Hi, could you please share the status of the electrical panel design approval? We need this to proceed with fabrication.

conversation_history.subject: Follow-Up: Electrical Panel Approval Status
conversation_history.body: Just checking if the approval has been issued. We are nearing the installation date and need your confirmation.

conversation_history.subject: Escalation – Electrical Panel Approval Delayed in Project Cascade
conversation_history.body: Hi Chandru, the vendor has not approved the electrical panel design yet despite follow-ups. This is now blocking the installation. Please advise on expediting or alternate approval workflow.
